| HistoryText             = The City Stealers were terrorists who received robotic exoskeletons from [[They Who Wield Power (Earth-616)|They Who Wield Power]] and tried to steal [[Manhattan]] by destroying the city's foundations and towing the island out to sea. They were defeated by [[Spider-Man (Peter Parker)|Spider-Man]] and [[Hercules Panhellenios (Earth-616)|Hercules]]{{r|Marvel Team-Up #28}}. However, Hercules later admitted that the story was largely exaggerated.
